{# render #} {% notifications := make(chan string, 10) %} notifications: {{ not not notifications }} len(notifications): {{ len(notifications) }} {% if notifications %} BAD {% else %} not elements to read {% end if %} {% notifications <- "message" %} notifications: {{ not not notifications }} len(notifications): {{ len(notifications) }} {{ <-notifications }} notifications: {{ not not notifications }} len(notifications): {{ len(notifications) }}
